name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess strong expertise in **Python**, **APIs**, and **Cloud** services, which enables me to build high-performance back-end systems. My experience with **Kubernetes** aligns well with modern deployment practices, ensuring robust containerized applications. I have a solid understanding of **security fundamentals** which is crucial for developing secure applications in compliance with industry standards. My skills also extend to designing effective **test strategies** and leveraging **data structures** for optimized application performance.

I specialize in full-stack development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** technologies, and I have deep cloud experience across **Azure** and **AWS**. I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing. With a proven foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, I build applications that meet rigorous compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally, I bring hands-on experience in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
